sentence.Network_en: As a T 310 user, you have free tools and tons of content waiting for you online.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为一个t310的用户, 将会有免费的工具和极大的满足在网络上等着您.

auth_sentence.content: There weren't tons and tons of people doing this.
auth_sentence.res_content: There weren't tons and tons of people doing this.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There weren't tons and tons of people doing this.

auth_sentence.content: Don't worry about providing tons of painted detail in the mouth.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't worry about providing tons of painted detail in the mouth.

auth_sentence.content: These aren't opinions, they are backed by tons of empirical data.
auth_sentence.res_content: These aren't opinions, they are backed by tons of empirical data.
